籤詩版本二:
Ikrele likhanya ngokuqaqambileyo xa liphuma ebhokisini, kodwa alitsali uthuli ebhokisini.
Kungokunje ndinomntu osisihandiba, onegunya nonegunya, bonke abantu bayandincoma
詩意:
Le hexagram imele ikrele eliphuma ebhokisini.
Yonke into inamandla kwaye inamandla.
解曰: Ikrele liphuma ebhokisini. Iqaqambile kumawaka eemayile. Isikhokelo esihle. Yonke into intle.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zhao Zilong ugcina i-Adou
Ngexesha lobuKumkani obuThathu, uZhao Yun, ogama linguZilong, wayeyinzalelwane yaseChangshan. Ekuqaleni, wayethembele kuYuan Shao, emva koko walandela uLiu (Bei), inkosi yokuqala ye-Western Shu.
Ngelo xesha, uCao Cao wayefuna ukuya ngasezantsi koMlambo waseYangtze.Waqala ukuhlasela inkosi yangaphambili uLiu Bei eXinye (igama lendawo), kwaye inkosi yangaphambili yabalekela eFancheng. Waphinda woyiswa eDangyang kwaye amalungu entsapho yakhe ahlukana. UZhao Yun wadibana noNksk Wei (uNksz Liu Bei) phantsi kodonga lomhlaba.
Eli nenekazi laphathisa unyana walo uAdou (unyana kaLiu Bei, uLiu Chan) kuZhao Yun. UZhao Yun walinika eli nenekazi ihashe, kodwa eli nenekazi alizange livume ukulamkela laza laziphosa equleni laza lafa.
Emva kokuba uZhao Yun wakhala waza wangcwaba umfazi wakhe, wamanga uAdou waza walwa indlela yakhe yokuphuma kungqingo.
聖意: Thandazela ithamsanqa kwikhaya lakho nakwikhaya lakho, uthandazele inzuzo yemali, ithamsanqa kwintengiselwano, umtshato olungileyo, abahambi ngeenyawo ababhinqileyo, imibungu yesilika yaseChiti, ukonakala kwemfuyo kwasekuqaleni, abantu abalahlekileyo, amatyala oluntu, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekileyo, izifo zasemazantsi, ukubuya. iminqweno endala, ithamsanqa kwiintaba kunye namangcwaba
